ABOUT US

90210 Love & Care, Inc. is owned and operated within the prestigious “Golden Triangle” of Beverly Hills, California and caters to the greater Los Angeles metropolitan area. Please let us know how we may be of service to you. We would be delighted to meet you!

90210 Love & Care employs handpicked competent, compassionate, and well-trained individuals of the highest caliber who are responsive to the needs of our clients, their families, and the communities we serve.

HOME

HOME CARE SERVICES

CAREGIVERS

CONTACT US

BLOG

90210 HOME CARE
THE 90210 TOUCH

"Thanks so much for all you do for me each and every day."

                        

                          - Cynthia W.

90210 Love & Care, Inc. specializes in providing concierge home care services to individuals of any age during any phase of their life. Our focus is to provide personalized service that enables our clients to maintain an independent lifestyle, while enhancing their quality of life. 90210 Love & Care represents the highest standard of concierge home care allowing us to meet and exceed the needs, desires and expectations of those entrusted in our care.

 

90210 Love & Care, Inc. is owned and operated within the prestigious “Golden Triangle” of Beverly Hills, California and caters to the greater Los Angeles metropolitan area. Please let us know how we may be of service to you. We would be delighted to meet you!

 

With Love and Care,

The 90210 Love & Care Family

© 90210 Love & Care, Inc.

HCO 194700228

caregivers.title: CAREGIVERS | 90210lovecare
caregivers.bodyText:
Skip to Main Content

HOME

THE 90210 TOUCH

HOME CARE SERVICES

CAREGIVERS

CONTACT US

BLOG

90210 HOME CARE
OUR CAREGIVERS

90210 Love & Care employs hand-picked compassionate and well-trained individuals of the highest caliber who are responsive to the needs of our clients, their families and the communities we serve.

 

Selected based upon professionalism, skills and experience.

 

Carefully screened and reference checked.

 

Background checked, registered on the California Home Care Aide Registry.

 

Bonded and insured.

 

Thoroughly trained and specially selected to incorporate personal preferences as well as special care needs.

 

All home care aides are employees of 90210 Love & Care, not sub-contracted or independent contractors.

 

We manage all aspects of taxes, benefits, and workers compensation – all of these elements are critical in protecting and shielding our clients.

© 90210 Love & Care, Inc.

HCO 194700228
